name: kenote-react-webpack
description: This is a React development tools.
author: thondery <thondery@163.com>

scripts.uptpl: rm -rf tpl/base/* && rm -rf tpl/base && git clone https://github.com/thondery/kenote-react-startkit.git tpl/base --separate-git-dir tpl/.baserc && rm -rf tpl/.baserc && rm -rf tpl/base/LICENSE tpl/base/README.md tpl/base/.gitignore
